name: groupstatsdiff
description: Evaluate the differences between two groupstats outputs from recon-all analyses in Freesurfer.

inputs.description: Output folder from groupstats for group 1
inputs.name: Group1 Directory

inputs.description: Output folder from groupstats for group 2
inputs.name: Group2 Directory

inputs.description: Output folder for the difference analysis
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: Only analyze ROI data, no maps
inputs.name: No Maps Flag

inputs.description: Use OSGM instead of native FSGD
inputs.name: OSGM Flag

inputs.description: Do not select common segments when running stattablediff
inputs.name: No Common Flag

inputs.description: Allow list of subjects to be different between the two analyses
inputs.name: Allow Subject Difference Flag

inputs.description: Do not compute area differences
inputs.name: No Area Flag

inputs.description: Do not compute volume differences
inputs.name: No Volume Flag

inputs.description: Do not compute differences for BA labels
inputs.name: No BA Flag

inputs.description: Do not do aparcstats
inputs.name: No Aparcstats Flag

inputs.description: Do not do asegstats
inputs.name: No Asegstats Flag

inputs.description: Do not do wmparcstats
inputs.name: No Wmparcstats Flag

inputs.description: Do not do any ROI stats
inputs.name: No Stats Flag

inputs.description: Do not prune when running mri_glmfit
inputs.name: No Prune Flag

inputs.description: Override the FWHM from group analysis
inputs.name: FWHM Value

inputs.description: Subjects directory 1 for computing dice (default is parent dir of groupdir)
inputs.name: Subjects Directory 1

inputs.description: Subjects directory 2 for computing dice (default is parent dir of groupdir)
inputs.name: Subjects Directory 2

inputs.description: Do not compute dice
inputs.name: No Dice Flag

inputs.description: CTAB to use for dice computation (default is /usr/local/freesurfer/ASegStatsLUT.txt)
inputs.name: Dice CTAB

author: FreeSurfer Developers
